statements: SELECT * FROM PlasticPollutionData;
SELECT LocationID, PollutionLevel FROM PlasticPollutionData WHERE PollutionLevel > 0.5;
SELECT RecordID, AnalysisType FROM PlasticPollutionData ORDER BY DateRecorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM PlasticPollutionData WHERE LocationID = 5 AND AnalysisType = 'Microplastics';
SELECT MAX(PollutionLevel) AS HighestPollutionLevel FROM PlasticPollutionData;
SELECT * FROM PlasticPollutionData WHERE PollutionLevel > 0.5;
SELECT LocationID, PollutionLevel, DateRecorded FROM PlasticPollutionData WHERE AnalysisType = 'Microplastics' ORDER BY DateRecorded DESC;
SELECT RecordID, PollutionLevel, DateRecorded FROM PlasticPollutionData WHERE LocationID IN (1, 2, 3) AND PollutionLevel >= 0.3 ORDER BY PollutionLevel DESC;
SELECT LocationID, AVG(PollutionLevel) AS AvgPollutionLevel FROM PlasticPollutionData GROUP BY LocationID HAVING AVG(PollutionLevel) > 0.1;
SELECT * FROM PlasticPollutionData WHERE AnalysisType LIKE '%plastic%' ORDER BY LocationID ASC, DateRecorded DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data;
SELECT country, pollution_level FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT country, YEAR(enacted_year) AS enacted_year FROM policy_making ORDER BY enacted_year DESC;
SELECT id, impact FROM policy_making WHERE legislation LIKE '%plastic%';
SELECT country, MAX(pollution_level) AS max_pollution_level FROM plastic_pollution_data GROUP BY country;
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE country='USA' AND year=2020;
SELECT country, pollution_level FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 50 ORDER BY pollution_level DESC;
SELECT country, year, legislation FROM plastic_pollution_data JOIN policy_making ON plastic_pollution_data.country = policy_making.country;
SELECT * FROM policy_making WHERE enacted_year BETWEEN 2015 AND 2020 ORDER BY enacted_year ASC;
SELECT country, AVG(pollution_level) AS avg_pollution FROM plastic_pollution_data GROUP BY country HAVING AVG(pollution_level) > 30;
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data;
SELECT country, plastic_waste_kg FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE year = 2021;
SELECT MAX(plastic_waste_kg) AS max_waste_kg, MIN(plastic_waste_kg) AS min_waste_kg FROM plastic_pollution_data;
SELECT data_source, analysis_type, trend_analysis FROM plastic_pollution_analysis WHERE report_id > 100;
SELECT country, recommendation, importance_level FROM policy_recommendations ORDER BY importance_level DESC;
SELECT country, year, plastic_waste_kg, population FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE year > 2015 ORDER BY country DESC, year ASC
SELECT MAX(plastic_waste_kg) AS max_waste, MIN(plastic_waste_kg) AS min_waste FROM plastic_pollution_data GROUP BY country
SELECT DISTINCT analysis_type FROM plastic_pollution_analysis
SELECT country, recommendation AS policy_recommendation FROM policy_recommendations WHERE importance_level < 3
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data INNER JOIN plastic_pollution_analysis ON plastic_pollution_data.country = plastic_pollution_analysis.data_source
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, pollution_level FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 0.5;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policy_making WHERE policy_id = 3;
SELECT trend_name FROM pollution_trends WHERE trend_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM environmental_conservation ORDER BY conservation_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE pollution_level > 5 ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT location, pollution_level FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE location LIKE '%coast%' ORDER BY pollution_level ASC;
SELECT * FROM pollution_trends WHERE trend_name = 'Plastic Recycling';
SELECT conservation_strategy, conservation_impact FROM environmental_conservation WHERE conservation_impact IS NOT NULL ORDER BY conservation_id;
SELECT policy_name, policy_description FROM policy_making WHERE policy_description LIKE '%plastic%' ORDER BY policy_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE country = 'USA' AND year = 2021
SELECT pollution_rate, year, country FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE pollution_rate > 2.5
SELECT country, year FROM plastic_pollution_data ORDER BY year DESC
SELECT * FROM marine_life_impact WHERE impact_severity = 'High'
SELECT impact_type, species FROM marine_life_impact WHERE species = 'Sea Turtles'
SELECT * FROM plastic_pollution_data WHERE country='USA';
SELECT species, impact_severity FROM marine_life_impact ORDER BY impact_severity DESC;
SELECT policy_id, policy_description FROM policy_measures WHERE policy_effectiveness='High';
SELECT * FROM pollution_sources WHERE source_type='Industrial' LIMIT 5;
SELECT action_id, action_description, action_effectiveness FROM conservation_actions;
